nodes.text: GXR-7 command droid was a battle droid of the Galactic Republic active during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY it was aboard the Thranta-class corvette Brentaal Star during the Attack on the Brentaal Star by the Gage-class transport Black Talon and was destroyed by an Imperial boarding party.
GXR-7 command droid appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as a boss during the "Black Talon" flashpoint.
